title:
The moduli space of genus $8$ Fano $3$-folds with two
  $\frac{1}{2}(1,1,1)$-points is rational
abstract:
Let $\mathcal{F}_{8,2\times \frac{1}{2}(1,1,1)}$ be the moduli space of genus
$8$ Fano $3$-folds with two singular points of type $\frac{1}{2}(1,1,1)$. We
show that $\mathcal{F}_{8,2\times \frac{1}{2}(1,1,1)}$ is a rational variety.
